channel.title: [PI/DSPK]Hair going through hats? Matching charactermodels and items
channel.description: Well, i'd like to know why this is doing this... [img]http://content.screencast.com/users/iChubs/folders/Jing/media/1453f3d8-52ec-4642-bfa1-2a0fee3bcf6b/2013-01-14_2301.png[/img] I've been wondering this the past few days now, because i now have 634 items, character models, and model header. They all match, so how would i be able to stop the hair going through the hat?

item.title: [PI/DSPK]Hair going through hats? Matching charactermodels and items
